note: Hello, my name is Richard Leblanc, aka sociallyawkward, I grew up in the foster care system and experienced a much different way of growing up. I started creating pop culture art to escape my daily life. Today, I create individually focused art, so if that is something that sounds interesting, I hope you follow me here, and feel free to reach out to me and ask me questions about this or anything else.

fields.name: Artist
fields.value: Pop culture, art, marketing, social media
